tssynth Documentation
=====================

Welcome to the tssynth documentation! This library provides tools for generating synthetic time series data with configurable trends, noise, anomalies, and inter-sensor dependencies.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   core
   trends
   noise
   anomalies
   dependencies
   patterns
   api
